methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Initialize the staking pool w/ owner and manager, but can only be created by the validator contract.

args.name: creatingContractID
args.desc: id of contract that constructed us - the validator application (single global instance)

args.name: validatorID
args.desc: id of validator we're a staking pool of

args.name: manager
args.desc: manager of pool (can issue payouts and online txns)

args.name: maxStakeAllowed
args.desc: maximum algo allowed in this staking pool

methods.name: gas
methods.desc: gas is a dummy no-op call that can be used to pool-up resource references and opcode cost

methods.name: addStake
methods.desc: Adds stake to the given account.Can ONLY be called by the validator contract that created usMust receive payment from the validator contract for amount being staked.

args.name: stakedAmountPayment
args.desc: prior payment coming from validator contract to us on behalf of staker.

returns.desc: {uint64}new 'entry time' in seconds of stake add.

methods.name: removeStake
methods.desc: Removes stake on behalf of a particular staker.  Also notifies the validator contract for this poolsvalidaotr of the staker / balance changes.

args.name: account
args.desc: The address of the account removing stake.

args.name: amountToUnstake
args.desc: The amount of stake to be removed.
